name: Xinyuan UG Coal Mine

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Xinyuan_Coal_Mine. The Xinyuan Coal Mine is an underground mine located in Caogou Village, Chaoyang Town, Shouyang County, Jinzhong City, Shanxi province, China

operators: Huayang New Material Technology Group Co., Ltd.
owners: Huayang New Material Technology Group Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: Huayang New Material Technology Group Co., Ltd. is the primary operator and owner, with a 55% stake, while Guangdong Lanyue Energy Development Co., Ltd. holds a 45% stake.
